sentences: Kui palju sellelt ärilt teenida võib?
Hoone esimesel korrusel asuvad ärid ja söögikohad.
context: The Estonian word 'äri' has two main meanings: 1) Business activities aimed at profit, including buying and selling, trading, etc. - this can refer to the act of doing business or the state/profitability of a business; 2) A shop or service establishment. The word is used in various compound terms like 'narkoäri' (drug trade), 'relvaäri' (arms trade), and 'fotoäri' (photography business). In its declension forms, it can appear as ärid (plural nominative), äril (adessive), etc.
